nodes.bodyText:
this should include all modules before optaplanner-persistence-jpa, including optaplanner-parent, optaplanner-bom, optaplanner-build-parent, optaplanner-persistence-common, ...
This is brittle: if we rename one of those modules or add one or remove one, it is broken.

If I recall correctly, there is a fix, I think: when building with maven from the root of the repository, there is a command line argument to build a specific module (optaplanner-persistence-jpa) and anything that needs to be build before it (so anything it depends on). That would ideal.
